physical_appearance:\The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a cemetery. The ground of the cemetery is uneven and there are trees in the background. Tombstones and their mounds can be seen. \\Chinese Cemetery\\ is stated at the bottom of the photograph.\
